item.title: Stopped from using mobile, 10-year-old ends life in UP
item.description: Stopped from using mobile, 10-year-old ends life in UP In a shocking incident, a 10-year-old boy allegedly died by suicide in Lucknow after his mother took away the phone and did not let him play online games.
